Properties.ProtectedString:
local HEAL_AMOUNT = 33
--Stickmasterluke
local Tool=script.Parent local handle=Tool:WaitForChild("Handle") local mesh=handle:WaitForChild("Mesh") local pizzasound=handle:WaitForChild("PizzaSound") local bodyp=handle:WaitForChild("BodyPosition") local debris=game:GetService("Debris") bodyp.maxForce=Vector3.new(0,0,0)
enabled=true
function fire(v) pizzasound:Play() if not handle.FlyingSound.IsPlaying then handle.FlyingSound:Play() end local vCharacter=Tool.Parent local vPlayer=game.Players:playerFromCharacter(vCharacter) local startpos=handle.Position local targetpos=startpos+(v*100)
local effect=Instance.new("Part") effect.Name="Effect" effect.TopSurface="Smooth" effect.BottomSurface="Smooth" effect.Size=Vector3.new(.2,.2,.2) effect.CanCollide=false effect.Anchored=false effect.Velocity=v*-10+Vector3.new(math.random()-.5,3,math.random()-.5)*10 effect.RotVelocity=Vector3.new(math.random()-.5,math.random()-.5,math.random()-.5)*10 effect.CFrame=handle.CFrame local m=Instance.new("SpecialMesh") m.MeshId="http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=125887676" --new "just box" mesh goes here. Does not need to be done. Not really noticeable that it is offset. m.TextureId="http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=125728597" m.Parent=effect debris:AddItem(effect,3) effect.Parent=game.Workspace
Tool.Parent=game.Workspace handle.CFrame=CFrame.new(startpos+v*5) handle.RotVelocity=Vector3.new(0,20,0) bodyp.maxForce=Vector3.new(1500,1500,1500) bodyp.D=1500 bodyp.P=1000 bodyp.position=targetpos mesh.MeshId="http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=125732887" --new "just pizza" mesh goes here. Tool.GripPos=Vector3.new(.5,-0.8,1.5) --Align pizza to mouth here. I tried to guess the best location if it was centered. wait(1) bodyp.position=targetpos*Vector3.new(1,0,1) bodyp.D=1600 wait(1) bodyp.maxForce=Vector3.new(0,0,0) handle.FlyingSound:Stop() end
function onActivated() if enabled then enabled=false local character=Tool.Parent local humanoid=character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid then local vec=(humanoid.TargetPoint-handle.Position).unit fire(vec) end wait(1.5) Tool.GripPos=Vector3.new(-.9,-1,.5) mesh.MeshId="http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=125736357" enabled=true end end
--[[ function onTouched(part) if string.lower(string.sub(part.Name,1,6))~="effect" then local h=part.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if h~=nil and Tool.Parent==game.Workspace then Tool.Handle.FlyingSound:Stop() bodyp.maxForce=Vector3.new(0,0,0) end end end ]]
local function OnToolChanged(property) if property == 'Parent' and Tool.Parent and bodyp.maxForce ~= Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) then local parent = Tool.Parent if parent and parent:IsA('Model') then local humanoid = parent:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') if humanoid then humanoid.Health = math.min(humanoid.Health + HEAL_AMOUNT, humanoid.MaxHealth) Tool.Handle.FlyingSound:Stop() bodyp.maxForce=Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) end end end end
--handle.Touched:connect(onTouched) Tool.Changed:connect(OnToolChanged) Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated)
